meaning: by means of, because, in view of, compared with

onyomiExamples.meaning: on and after, as from, hereafter, thereafter, since
not exceeding, and downward, ... and below, below (e.g. standard), under (e.g. a level), the below-mentioned, the following, the rest

kunyomiExamples.meaning: with, by, by means of, because of, on account of, for, due to, on (a day, date), at (a time), as of (e.g. today), adds emphasis to preceding word, in addition (to being), moreover, as well as, and, therefore, and so, hence
(not) even when using ..., (not) even with the help of ..., (not) even by ...
